name: Kim Holmes
text: I was beyond blessed to receive a gift set of your oils for Christmas.  They are beyond incredible. Whatever culinary dish you are preparing will be brought to the next level of awesome with these products.

resp.text: Thank you Kim, we appreciate it! We love what we do in cooking, meeting people who also love to cook. Let us know if there is anything that you need. You can even go to our site www.olivefruitstore.com. We are updating the site with new products so if you don't see what you need you can always call us at either shop. Enterprise 334 464 9726 or Dothan 334 446 4598. thank you again! Louis and Jackie

name: Pia Lee
text: Just discovered this GEM by walking by, so glad we stopped in. We are adding amazing flavor to our foods now.  Owners are so wonderful and kind, we will be returning again and again.  You get to taste all the different Oils, the infused give a wonderful flavor to your dish. There is also the healthy table that has different oil for health benefits.    Worth stopping by....

resp.text:
Thank you Pia we appreciate you stopping into our shop. Thank for your comments and the picture as well. We love what we do and hope to see you soon again.

If you are in the area this weekend we are having a Healthy Eating Day at our Dothan shop on Saturday from 1:30 to 3:30 with local vendors. Eves Garden Raw Food Café, Well rooted CBD Oil, and Hawkins Homestead Farm (fresh vegetable growers from Kinsey AL) As well The Wokman who makes custom made Woks and he will be doing some cooking outside with fresh veggies! See you soon!

name: Terri Dewald
text:
Oh my goodness! This olive oil and balsamic vinegar store is awesome! Lewis, is very knowledgeable about oils and vinegars and has wonderful suggestions on how to pair and used the products.
This is a very welcoming store!

resp.text:
Hi Terri thank you so much we love to taste, cook, and invite others to a healthier way of eating as well meeting people that love the same.
Thank you and stop by anytime.

name: Anne Powe
text: Awesome experience!  So many choices, friendly and helpful people, will definitely have to visit again via wesite!

name: Mark Vickers
text: Staff is very helpful and the products and choices are excellent

name: D R
text: Wonderful owner that will tell you all about the different olive oils. We have been a customer for several years. I was amazed at the difference between cheap grocery store oil and real oil.

name: david myrick
text: The products are amazing great service super nice people. I highly recommend this place. My wife fell in Love with the uniqueness of the shop.

resp.text: Thank you Kerry for stopping by our shop appreciate you.  Stop back when ever you get a chance were always doing something new!

name: Suzanne Dick
text:
Lovely shop.  Set-up perfect for both tasting & viewing of all oils & vinegars.
Met Louis & Jackie Cameron, Owners.  Made my girlfriend and I most welcome.  We are both Red Hat Chapter, Queens and he then explained they have a private room that could be made available for our chapter meetings or schedule a private tasting for our chapterettes as well.

The tasting of the differnt oils that I personally was interested in was a wonderful experience not to mention I purchased those that I loved the best.

If you have not experienced this type of venue for goodness sakes go for something unique and new that is now available here in Dothan.

Dothan has another great place to experience and take home something different that makes your palate want more!

I personally think Dothan has a hit!

Loved it
Suzanne Dick

name: Kenneth S
text: Went here with my family while I was on vacation. The olive oils that they have here are amazing. I really enjoyed the taste testing that they have available here. I will definitely have to have my parents send my olive oils from here.

name: Brandy Halverson
text: I can't remember the sales person names but it was friendly, helpful, and knowledgeable.  I enjoyed shopping here. I already have recommended to many people ava plan to return. I love all the oils and vingerettes. I highly recommend!!

name: kiesha
text: It was a great experience !!  Owners were very nice and knowledgeable about the products

resp.text: Thank you Zakeisha for stopping by our shop appreciate you.  Stop back when ever you get a chance were always doing something new!

name: Teri Curtis
text: So many different oil and vinegar options, they also have a great assortment of spices for cooking.

name: Tiffany Wesley (601Beauty)
text: I'm over the moon with this store! I can't wait to go back and try more delicious vinaigrettes and olive oils!

name: Kerry Hamrick
text: Love the varieties of oil and balsamics

resp.text: Thank you Kerry for stopping by our shop appreciate you.  Stop back when ever you get a chance were always doing something new!

name: Karla Messenger
text: The assortment of vinegars and oils are mind boggling!  And the spice packets for mixing with oil will change your mind on cooking.

resp.text: Thank you Karla for stopping by our shop appreciate you.  Stop back when ever you get a chance were always doing something new!
